nlp.token
Class Token

java.lang.Object
  nlp.token.Token

public class Token
extends java.lang.Object

A class for storing a token. It is a String and the associated attributes. 

 Typical use:
 Token  tok = new Token(Token.TT_WORD,"word");
 String s   = tok.getName();
 Vector v   = Token.readXML(System.in);
